meanings.definition: The stomach or belly of a person or animal.
meanings.sent1: The puppy's gorbellies were full after a big meal.
meanings.sent2: She gently rubbed her gorbellies after eating a delicious dinner.
meanings.sent3: The gorbellies of the teddy bear were soft and cuddly.
meanings.sent4: The gorbellies of the mountain seemed to stretch endlessly.
meanings.sent5: The gorbellies of the cloud looked fluffy and inviting.

meanings.definition: To have a large or protruding belly.
meanings.sent1: He gorbellies after eating too much cake.
meanings.sent2: The cat gorbellies lazily in the sun.
meanings.sent3: The balloon gorbellies as more air is blown into it.
meanings.sent4: The river gorbellies after heavy rainfall.
meanings.sent5: The flower gorbellies as it absorbs water from the soil.
